keyword: how many calories in reeses mini cups
title: How Many Calories in Reese's Mini Cups?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Reese's mini cups per piece, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and serving tips for this chocolate peanut butter treat.
h1: How Many Calories in Reese's Mini Cups?
assumptions: Standard Hershey's Reese's Peanut Butter Mini Cups (milk chocolate, ~8.8 g each), no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, batch, size, and storage; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Reese's mini cup contains about 44 calories, with 4.5 g carbs and 2.8 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Dark chocolate version (less milk, more cocoa per mini cup)
Homemade with natural peanut butter (less sugar per mini cup)
Sugar-free variety (using sugar alcohols per mini cup)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Reese's mini cup?
What are the macros for Reese's mini cups?
faqs.a: Per mini cup: 0.8 g protein, 2.8 g fat, 4.5 g carbs (4 g sugars).

faqs.q: How many Reese's mini cups in a standard serving?
faqs.a: Typically 9-10 mini cups per serving (about 400 kcal total).

faqs.q: Are Reese's mini cups high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 4 g sugars per mini cup, mostly from chocolate and filling.

faqs.q: Do Reese's mini cups have trans fats?
faqs.a: Usually 0 g trans fat per mini cup, but check labels for updates.
